parameters.jsCode:
let dataReFormat = ''
const rawData = $input.all()[0]?.json



dataReFormat =  `\n Information of Project: \n Name: ${rawData?.project?.name}; \n Project Summary: ${rawData?.project?.summary};
\n Start Date of Project: ${rawData?.project?.start_date}; \n Deadline of Project: ${rawData?.project?.deadline};`


dataReFormat = dataReFormat +  '\n \n Contact Bussiness Analyst (BA): \n ' + 'Name: ' + rawData?.BA?.name 


console.log('dataReFormat: ', dataReFormat)

return { prepareText: dataReFormat };

parameters.jsCode:
let dataReFormat = ''
const rawData = $input.all()[0]?.json



dataReFormat =  `\n Information of Project: \n Name: ${rawData?.project?.name}; \n Project Summary: ${rawData?.project?.summary};
\n Start Date of Project: ${rawData?.project?.start_date}; \n Deadline of Project: ${rawData?.project?.deadline};`


dataReFormat = dataReFormat +  '\n \n Contact Bussiness Analyst (BA): \n ' + 'Name: ' + (rawData?.BA?.name != null ? rawData?.BA?.name : rawData?.BA?.nameProject)


console.log('dataReFormat: ', dataReFormat)

return { prepareText: dataReFormat };

{{ $('Standardize3').item.json.textHtml }}

Link project: {{ $('Take Value3').first().json.project.name }}

parameters.subject: cảnh
parameters.html:
=

Dear Team and Evan from Nitro Design,

I hope this email finds you well. As the Business Analyst for the Nitro Designs Project at CmsMart, I am writing to provide you with the details of our project that is set to kick-off on the 30th of October, 2024.

Project Overview:

  • Name: Nitro Designs Project
  • Client: Evan from Nitro Design
  • Email: evan@nitrodesigns.net

Milestone Goals:

Our key objective is the development for Nitro Designs. You can find detailed specifications in the attached document. This includes two mockups to provide a visual representation of what we aim to accomplish.

  • Firstly, we plan to offer customizable wrap styles in various colors, as shown in the initial photo.
  • Secondly, the second photo demonstrates the range of number styles. Our goal is to incorporate this functionality into our interactive interface.
  • Lastly, the website we're drawing inspiration from can be reviewed here.
  • Please note, our deadline for this project is the 28th of November, 2024.

Please review the details and respond with any suggestions, concerns or questions. It's important we're all aligned from the get-go so we can work collaboratively and effectively to drive results.

Thank you all for your commitment to this project. I look forward to our journey together in creating something great. Feel free to contact me at huy.nhd@netbasejsc.com if you need any further information or clarification.

Best regards,

Jerry Nguyen

Business Analyst, Nitro Designs Project at CmsMart

Link project: Nitro Designs Project

parameters.html:
=

Dear Team and Evan from Nitro Design,

I hope this email finds you well. As the Business Analyst for the Nitro Designs Project at CmsMart, I am writing to provide you with the details of our project that is set to kick-off on the 30th of October, 2024.

Project Overview:

  • Name: Nitro Designs Project
  • Client: Evan from Nitro Design
  • Email: evan@nitrodesigns.net

Milestone Goals:

Our key objective is the development for Nitro Designs. You can find detailed specifications in the attached document. This includes two mockups to provide a visual representation of what we aim to accomplish.

  • Firstly, we plan to offer customizable wrap styles in various colors, as shown in the initial photo.
  • Secondly, the second photo demonstrates the range of number styles. Our goal is to incorporate this functionality into our interactive interface.
  • Lastly, the website we're drawing inspiration from can be reviewed here.
  • Please note, our deadline for this project is the 28th of November, 2024.

Please review the details and respond with any suggestions, concerns or questions. It's important we're all aligned from the get-go so we can work collaboratively and effectively to drive results.

Thank you all for your commitment to this project. I look forward to our journey together in creating something great. Feel free to contact me at huy.nhd@netbasejsc.com if you need any further information or clarification.

Best regards,

Jerry Nguyen

Business Analyst, Nitro Designs Project at CmsMart
